title: Hundreds of Suicidal Teens Sleep in Emergency Rooms. Every Night. - The New York Times
description: With inpatient psychiatric services in short supply, adolescents are spending days, even weeks, in hospital emergency departments awaiting the help they desperately need.

title: Amazon Fires Senior Managers Tied to Unionized Staten Island Warehouse - The New York Times
description: Company officials said the terminations were the result of an internal review, while the fired managers saw it as a response to the recent union victory.
